one_reviews_text: Okay, so there's some interesting visuals here.  There's some nice audio tidbits.  But I just didn't get it.  You click on different objects and then some animations start along with a voice recording.  But it seemed very random.  Then after you click on all of them, it ends abruptly.  Feels like a student project where they probably got a C+ as their final grade.

This felt like it carried on the story, though the artwork was amazingly different. So I think we got more of the daughter's story. The dragon was the big tipoff, asnd the line was the same, I think. So I think it's the daughter. I'm guessing dad wasn't much of a prize. It does end abruptly though, I though my Oculus crashed.
